title: Xfive: Work at Xfive
description:
Headquarters: Krakow, 12, 31-035 Poland
    
URL: http://xfive.co











Job description

Do you want to become Xfive¬†team member?¬†
We're always on the lookout for some extraordinary talent to join our crew. Whether you're a coding wizard, a project management guru, a design virtuoso‚Äì we want you on board!¬†


What's in It for You?

A Long-Term Gig: We're all about building lasting relationships, so you can count on a long-term commitment with us.

Pay That Makes You Smile: Our salary range is pretty nice, up to $6,000. We believe in rewarding your hard work!

Flexible Hours: Night owl or early bird? No worries, choose the hours that work best for you. We value your work-life balance.

Rockstar Projects: Get ready to create jaw-dropping applications that will make your friends jealous!

Global Adventures: Work on international projects for some of the coolest clients out there.

Skills and Certifications: We love to see our team members grow. Expect opportunities to learn new skills and get professional certifications.

Openness and Humor: We're a bunch of open-minded, funny folks. We believe work should be fun!



Who We Want:

Web Developers: Masters of coding world.¬†

E-commerce Developer: Online stores genius.¬†¬†

Project Managers: Organizational pros who keep projects on point.

Business Development Managers: Go-getters who bring in exciting projects.

Designers: Creative minds that know no bounds.

Mobile Developers: App wizards who make smartphones even smarter.


Job requirements




Communication Skills: You have excellent verbal and written communication skills in English, and you're not afraid to communicate with clients directly during online meetings.

Openness and Willingness to Learn: We value individuals who are open, have a sense of humor, and are eager to learn.

Timely Delivery: You can deliver projects on time and at a high-quality level.

Coding Excellence: You have a consistent coding style and a passion for well-organized, clean code.




Remote

Krakow, Ma≈Çopolskie, Poland

Development








All done!
Your application has been successfully submitted!

Other jobs






To apply: https://weworkremotely.com/remote-jobs/xfive-work-at-xfive

title: Umpisa: Mid-Level Web App Developer (Remote)
description:
Headquarters: Philippines
    
URL: http://umpisa.co


Description
At Umpisa Inc., our mission is to make the Philippines be known globally as a tech hub.¬†

Umpisa Inc. is a progressive technology services company that partners with select industries, clients and people to work on pioneering and industry-changing solutions via digital transformation, modern software development and venture building.

We create a set of world-class and impactful products and solutions to help organizations and individuals live better lives. We offer demanding, challenging and rewarding careers in software development, product development, emerging technologies, and more for the right candidates.

Essential Skills:
 
Aligns with our values: Excellence, Integrity, Professionalism, People Success, Customer Success, Fun, Innovation and Diversity
 Strong communication skills
 Strong problem solving and analytical skills
 Excellent problem-solving ability
 Would like to work as part of a self-organizing Scrum team in a scaled agile framework
 Must be a self-starter and loves to collaborate with the team and client
 

Job Summary
As a Web Developer, you will be responsible for working across the full technology stack ‚Äî from developing intuitive and responsive user interfaces to implementing robust and scalable backend services. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including Content and Design, to deliver high-quality features that enhance the user experience and promote local tourism initiatives in Japan.

Requirements
Technical Skills:

2‚Äì4 years experience with web app development

 Strong hands-on experience with Vue.js and Nuxt

 Familiarity with Supabase (or Firebase) and PostgreSQL
 Comfortable with TypeScript, server routes, and client-server integration
 Knowledge of i18n best practices for multilingual sites
 Git workflow experience (PRs, branches, merge conflicts)
 Basic deployment/security knowledge with platforms like Cloudflare
 

Soft Skills & Cultural Fit
 
Fluent in English (spoken & written) - Japanese language not required
 Excellent communication: proactive in weekly check-ins, async-friendly
 High attention to detail and ability to work independently
 Strong interest in Japan and sensitivity to its culture/aesthetics
  Comfortable receiving and incorporating feedback
 

Nice to Have:
 
Experience working in travel, tourism, or content-based platforms
 Been to Japan or familiar with Japanese geography, culture, or destinations
 Japanese language skills (written preferably)
 Startup or small team experience
 

How to Apply:
Please submit your application with the following:

 
Your resume and portfolio
 GitHub profile or recent code samples
 A brief paragraph about your interest in Japan or travel platforms
 



To apply: https://weworkremotely.com/remote-jobs/umpisa-mid-level-web-app-developer-remote

title: Mobbin: UX Annotator
description:
Headquarters: Indonesia
    
URL: http://mobbin.com


About Mobbin
Our mission is to empower the world to design great digital experiences.
The Mobbin platform helps product designers, product managers and UI/UX researchers find highly-relevant references to their design problems. We are the world's most extensive app design reference library, serving over a million users on our platform.
Since our inception in 2018, we've grown tremendously via word-of-mouth. Today, Mobbin is used by most design-forward companies and startups, including Duolingo, Revolut, Headspace, Work & Co, Blinkist, and more.
Read more about who we are: https://careers.mobbin.com

Contract (Full-time), Remote
üö´ Note that this is not a Data Annotator, UX Designer, or UX Researcher role. You will not be designing or conducting research in any capacity. Instead, you will spend most of your time annotating screenshots.

The role
As a UX Annotator, you will meticulously annotate screens and user flows, ensuring that our users always find the most relevant references.
You will have the opportunity to expose yourself to a diverse range of real-world designs each week to further develop your understanding.
Additionally, you will work closely with UX analysts to ensure the high accuracy and quality of our annotations.

What you‚Äôll do‚Ä¶

Annotate screens and flows with information about design patterns and UI elements following our guidelines.

Stay informed on updates to guidelines and incorporate feedback to continuously improve annotations.

Collaborate with team members to improve the accuracy and quality of annotations.

Clarify any doubts in your work, for example, by seeking clarification from UX analysts.

Identify and rectify errors and inconsistencies to maintain high standards.


You should‚Ä¶

Have a strong interest in UI/UX and a good understanding of design patterns. You will need to identify different complexities of design patterns and elements. You should be highly interested in delving into the nuances.

Be meticulous and have strong attention to detail. You should strive to be accurate and consistent in your annotations.

Be collaborative and communicate effectively. You should have good written and verbal communication skills in English.

Have good time management skills. You will need to be able to coordinate and manage your time effectively to meet the content schedule.

Have a personal computer with a stable internet connection. You will be using your own device for work.

To apply: https://weworkremotely.com/remote-jobs/mobbin-ux-annotator

title: Lemon.io: Senior Full-stack .NET Developer
description:
Headquarters: New York, NY
    
URL: https://lemon.io


Are you a talented Senior Developer looking for a remote job that lets you show your skills and get decent compensation? Look no further than Lemon.io ‚Äî the marketplace that connects you with hand-picked startups in the US and Europe.
Currently, we are seeking a Senior Full-Stack Developer for our client. It‚Äôs a direct hire position, but there is a paid trial period of 3‚Äì6 months before signing the contract directly with the client.
You should have a strong background in .NET and modern Front-end frameworks (Vue.js or React.js). The ideal candidate will bring both breadth and depth of experience, with the flexibility to balance 50/50 Front-end and Back-end responsibilities, while maintaining a slight Back-end focus.
Location / Time Zone: LATAM, Canada, or US time zones.
Education: Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
We are looking for a candidate who is not just technically strong but also thrives in a mission-driven, collaborative environment:
Proactive developer with a focus on long-term, stable collaboration.
Strong team player, able to adapt to dynamic processes and evolving environments.
Problem-solving mindset with attention to detail and commitment to high-quality delivery.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to clearly articulate technical concepts.
Human-centered approach to technology, passionate about the positive impact on people‚Äôs health.
Requirements:
6+ years of commercial experience in software development.
At least 3 years of commercial experience in front-end development.
4.5+ years of experience with .NET and ASP.NET Core, ideally combined with additional back-end technologies.
3+ years of experience with Vue.js or React.js.
Proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript is required.
Architecture: Familiarity with Cloud Architecture and scalable system design.
Expertise with Cypress, Playwright, Mocha, NUnit, and Puppeteer.js is a huge benefit.
Strong technical skills: as a Senior Developer, you are expected to be able to create projects from scratch and have a deep understanding of application architecture.
Clear and effective communication in English ‚Äî advanced ability to discuss business tasks, justify decisions, and communicate issues. Strong self-presentation skills are also essential for upcoming client calls.
Strong self-organizational skills ‚Äî ability to work full-time remotely without supervision.
Reliability ‚Äî we want to trust you and expect that you won‚Äôt let us or the client down.
Adaptability and flexibility ‚Äî the ability to onboard the project quickly after accepting it and start delivering results promptly.
Does this sound like a good fit for you? Apply now and join our client‚Äôs team! The project is focused on healthcare and has the potential to make a significant impact on people‚Äôs lives.
Other Options from Lemon.io
NOT YOUR TECH STACK?
We have different projects for Senior Developers, so if you have 4+ years of commercial experience in software development and you are fluent with React & Node.js, React & Python, Node & Python, Swift & SwiftUI, Unreal Engine, Data Engineering, WordPress, Blockchain, Svelte & TypeScript, Svelte & Node, Svelte & Python, or Shopify & JavaScript, Golang, PHP & Vue, Rust, MLOps, we would be happy to communicate and provide you with a project that matches your experience. Just apply, and we will share more details with you.
If your experience matches our requirements, be ready for the next steps:
VideoAsk ‚Äî watch a short video about our startup, up to 10 minutes
Complete your profile on our website
30-minute screening call
Technical interview
Feedback
Magic Box (we are looking for the best project for you).
P.S. We work with developers from 50+ countries in different regions: Europe, LATAM, Asia (Philippines, Indonesia), Oceania (Australia, New Zealand, Papua New Guinea), Canada, and the UK. However, we have some exceptions.
At the moment, we don‚Äôt have a legal basis to accept applicants from the following countries:
European: Iceland, Liechtenstein, Kosovo, Belarus, Russia, and Serbia.
Latin America: Cuba and Nicaragua
Most Asian countries and Africa.
We expand and shorten the list of exemptions regularly.
Do you represent a company with engineers who match the description and want to collaborate with us through staff augmentation? Then register here.
¬†
To apply: https://weworkremotely.com/remote-jobs/lemon-io-senior-full-stack-net-developer

title: Nutrient: Senior TypeScript SDK Engineer
description:
Headquarters: Raleigh, NC, USA
    
URL: https://www.nutrient.io


Who We Are‚Ä¶
At Nutrient, we equip developers and innovators with cutting-edge tools to simplify workflows and accelerate impactful software creation. We‚Äôre on a mission to redefine how documents are created, shared, and experienced. Our software development kits enable companies to work smarter and faster, saving time and expenses along the way, while effectively replacing the need for paper processes.
Your Role at Nutrient‚Ä¶
The team you will be joining is responsible for the¬†Nutrient Web SDK. Take a look at its¬†API docs¬†to get an understanding of the scope involved: It is a toolbox for web engineers and application developers who need a painless way to render, edit and process documents. It either runs client-side using WebAssembly or connects to the¬†Nutrient Document Engine.
This means that our SDK has to work for diverse use cases we constantly keep learning about from our customers. It needs to be convenient to use and easy to integrate; well architected, tested and documented; and loved by LLMs.
Your day to day work ranges (depending on your personal preferences and the current priorities) from writing code and documentation to talking directly with customers in order to understand their use cases and devise solutions for them, which you will incorporate into the evolving architecture of the product.
If you think you have the aptitude to contribute to building this product we would like to hear from you. You'll have autonomy, learn a lot and will shape the future of this product.
What You‚Äôll Bring‚Ä¶
Strong General Programming Skills:¬†You're well versed in OOP & FP, data structures & algorithms and understand that even a client-side SDK forms part of a larger distributed system. You‚Äôre driven by a curiosity to understand how things work.
Passion for Building in the B2D Space:¬†¬†You don't write code for the sake of it, but to provide value to our customers by getting the user/developer experience right
Collaborative and Self-Managing:¬†You don't need hand-holding, and you're gaining energy from exchanging ideas, both async and sync.
Bias towards Shipping:¬†You move fast and take ownership for solving problems from start to finish.
What We'll Bring‚Ä¶
We are a globally distributed company, backed by Insight Partners. We embrace a low-meeting culture and prioritize asynchronous communication to provide flexibility and focus. Working hours overlap with most of the team across the US, Europe, and Asia.
We offer competitive salaries, comprehensive benefits, and an annual global retreat to celebrate achievements and foster connections. Past retreats have taken place in locations like Croatia, Spain, and Greece.¬†
Nutrient believes in equal opportunity, we employ people from many different cultures and countries. We celebrate diversity and are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, skill sets, perspectives, as well as providing our employees with a work environment free of harassment. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, age, marital status, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other non-merit factor.¬†
We are a remote company. To ensure overlap with most of the team across the US, Europe and Asia, we‚Äôre looking for someone who will have a significant overlap with US and European working hours.¬† If working from the US, you must be located in Florida, Indiana, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, South Carolina, Tennessee, Texas, or Virginia for payroll processing.
To apply: https://weworkremotely.com/remote-jobs/nutrient-senior-typescript-sdk-engineer

title: Perfect (Stealth Technology Startup): Lead Software Engineer
description:
Headquarters: New York, NY
    
URL: https://perfect.careers


We‚Äôre a funded, stealth startup modernizing overlooked assets within the hospitality industry.
We‚Äôre putting together a distributed, low-headcount, founding software engineering team. This team will work directly with and report to our CTO (who has extensive venture building experience).
If you‚Äôre a high-impact, low-ego contributor who:
ships performant code with predictable operating characteristics,
has been more than ‚Äújust tinkering‚Äù with LLMs and codegen, and
can work 4+ hours overlapped with UTC-04:00‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶we‚Äôd love to hear from you.
Note: we care more about demonstrable talent than ‚Äúperfect‚Äù candidates who checks all the boxes below. If this describes you, we¬†very much¬†encourage you to apply.
What You‚Äôll Do
Build¬†our core platform from the ground up
Design APIs and data models¬†that power seamless integrations with hospitality systems
Implement AI-driven features¬†using LLMs and modern ML tooling
Own end-to-end delivery¬†from requirements through production
Collaborate closely¬†with our CTO and founding team
Research and evaluate and experiment with¬†new technologies and tools
What We‚Äôre Looking For
Technical Chops
5+ years¬†of software development experience
Strong backend expertise¬†with modern languages (Go, Python, Javascript and/or similar)
Production experience¬†with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and containerization
Database and data modeling skills¬†both relational and non-relational
API development¬†experience with REST and RPC
Some hands-on experience and strong opinions (weakly held) about¬†LLMs and automated code gen as part of a modern software engineering team
Soft Skills & Working Style
Founding team mentality¬†- you thrive in ambiguous, rapidly-changing environments
Systems thinking¬†- you consider scalability, maintainability, and operational concerns from day one
Communication skills¬†- you can explain complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
Self-directed¬†- you can work independently while staying aligned with team goals
Quality-focused¬†- you produce maintainable, well-tested code
Ownership mindset¬†- you keep user needs top-of-mind and own the outcome
Helpful, but not necessary
Experience in hospitality and travel (e.g., integrations with OHIP, MEWS, etc.)
DevOps and infrastructure automation experience
Open source contributions or technical writing
Previous startup experience, especially at the founding stage
Experience with real-time systems or event-driven architectures
Our Tech Stack
We‚Äôre building with modern, proven technologies. No decisions have been made yet.
Compensation and Leveling Expectations
We prefer full-time work arrangements, but can be flexible for the right candidates.
We encourage applicants at all levels of their software development journey to apply.
Compensation is competitive‚Äîit is based on your skills, location, and commitment level.
To apply: https://weworkremotely.com/remote-jobs/perfect-stealth-technology-startup-lead-software-engineer

title: OnTheGoSystems: PHP and React Developer
description:
Headquarters: 100% remote
    
URL: https://onthegosystems.com


OntheGoSystems is looking for senior developers to build products that over 250,000 happy clients use every day. We write PHP and React code and fully cover it by automated tests. We pay close attention to design, usability, performance and security. If this sounds like yourself, we want to meet.
What strong skills we‚Äôre looking for in our developers
Strong skills in PHP, React, Redux
Expertise in databases,
Proficiency in writing and applying automated tests with PHPUnit,
Experience in writing end-to-end tests,
Proficiency in version control with Git,
A strong foundation in design patterns, and networking.
What you will do
Build and maintain key features for WPML, ensuring they are reliable and perform well.
Work with other teams to design and develop new features and improvements.
Solve technical problems and make sure the code is clean, efficient, and scalable.
Take charge of your projects from start to finish, managing your time and priorities effectively.
Help improve our development process and suggest ways to make things more efficient.
Our expectations
Code Quality: Write clean, well-documented code that meets company standards.
Test Coverage: Ensure the code is covered by automated tests.
Meaningful Logs: Provide clear, insightful logs to track system performance.
Continuous Improvement: Learn new skills, improve processes, and contribute to team growth.
What we offer
100% remote position,
Body And Mind Movement (BAMM) program to support your physical activities and other hobbies,
A computer budget to make your workplace better,
A Kindle device with an access to our company Amazon account,
We respect national holidays in each country and want you to have a rest on those days,
Being a part of a team of smart, self-driven individuals,
Great opportunity to progress and advance,
Collaborating with team members across the globe.
If it sounds interesting to you, apply today and we are looking forward to getting to know you better!
To apply: https://weworkremotely.com/remote-jobs/onthegosystems-php-and-react-developer

title: Lemon.io: Senior iOS/Swift Developer
description:
Headquarters: New York, NY
